translations: 升管，[机]冒口（riser 的复数）

sentences.sentence: As a group, "night owl" types tend to eat less healthy food and take in more calories overall than early risers.
sentences.translation: 作为一个群体，总体来说，“夜猫子”型的人往往比早起的人吃的健康食品更少，摄入的卡路里更多。

sentences.sentence: In contrast, "night owls" who go to bed between 11 p.m. and 3 a.m. tend to consume more coffee, alcohol, refined sugars and processed meats than early risers.
sentences.translation: 与此相反，晚上11点到凌晨3点睡觉的“夜猫子”比早起的人倾向于消耗更多的咖啡、酒精、精制糖和加工肉类。

sentences.sentence: In contrast, "night owls" who go to bed between 11 p.m. and 3 a.m. tend to consume more coffee, alcohol, refined sugars, and processed meats than early risers.
sentences.translation: 与此相反，晚上11点到凌晨3点睡觉的“夜猫子”比早起的人倾向于消耗更多的咖啡、酒精、精制糖和加工肉类。
